entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with freezing drizzle. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with freezing drizzle. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
